name: Cloudflare Edge Delivery Metrics for 10 SaaS Platforms (2026)
description: A technical dataset covering edge delivery percentages, architecture patterns, and Cloudflare product adoption (Workers, KV, WAF, CDN) across 10 major SaaS platforms including Discord, Shopify, GitHub, and Notion.

variableMeasured.name: Edge Delivery Percentage
variableMeasured.description: Estimated percentage of traffic delivered from Cloudflare edge locations

variableMeasured.name: Architecture Pattern
variableMeasured.description: Classification as All-In Edge or Hybrid architecture
